news.title: Amazon halts Blue Jay robotics project after less than six months
news.summary: Amazon said Blue Jay's core tech will be used for other robotics projects and the employees who worked on it were moved to other projects.

news.title: Mastodon, a decentralized alternative to X, plans to target creators with new features
news.summary: Mastodon is looking to grow its open source, decentralized social network with new features aimed at creators.

news.title: Data breach at fintech giant Figure affects close to a million customers
news.summary: The Figure data breach allowed hackers to steal customer names, dates of birth, physical addresses, phone numbers, and email addresses.

news.title: World Labs lands $1B, with $200M from Autodesk, to bring world models into 3D workflows
news.summary: The partnership will see the two companies exploring how World Labs’ models can work alongside Autodesk’s tools, and vice versa, starting with a focus on entertainment use cases.

news.title: Google debuts $499 Pixel 10a
news.summary: The smartphone is available for preorder now with shipments starting March 5.  It comes in Lavender, Berry, Fog, and Obsidian.

news.title: Microsoft is bringing a built-in network speed test to Windows 11
news.summary: Microsoft is working on a bunch of new features for Windows 11, including a new network speed test that you can access from your taskbar. news.title: Are Elon Musk’s Mars plans finally coming back down to Earth?
news.summary: Maybe you've heard, but Elon Musk is apparently a Moon fan now. news.summary: On Wednesday, Audible launched a new "immersion reading" feature that could help readers concentrate on their audiobooks by allowing them to read along with the ebook version. news.title: Big Tech Says Generative AI Will Save the Planet. It Doesn’t Offer Much Proof
news.summary: A new report finds that of 154 specific claims about how AI will benefit the climate, just a quarter cited academic research. A third included no evidence at all.
